segments.text: My attention keeps returning to the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the water pouring over her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The continuous sheet of water is unmistakable, a small waterfall in her kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so absorbed in her task, polishing that plate with intense focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost irritating to see such a lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire floor is going to be completely ruined by all this water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets below the sink are getting soaked too, surely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically visualize the warping wood and peeling paint.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, just running and running without purpose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with her calm expression is truly jarring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She acts as if everything is perfectly normal, which it clearly isn't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and make her look down!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This overflowing mess is quite a peculiar sight.
segments.speaker: PAR
